Synopsis: Retrieves a specific file item from an OpenAI Vector Store.
Description: The Get-OAIVectorStoreFileItem function retrieves a specific file item from an OpenAI Vector Store based on the provided VectorStoreId and FileId.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-OAIVectorStoreFileItem -VectorStoreId "12345" -FileId "67890"
Retrieves the file item with the ID "67890" from the Vector Store with the ID "12345".
